==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|にん|めい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=にんめい}} compound {{m|zh|任命|tr=nyim<sup>H</sup> mjæng<sup>H</sup>|lit=burden, charge + command}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|任命|tr=rènmìng||to appoint}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|にんめい|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|にんめい}}

# an [[appointment]], [[assignment]], [[installation]], [[induction]], or [[instatement]] of a person to an [[office]] or [[position]]

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|任命権|にんめいけん}}: [[appointive]] [[power]], the power to appoint or [[name]] someone to an office or position
* {{ja-r|任命式|にんめいしき}}: a [[swear in|swearing-in]] [[ceremony]]
{{der-bottom}}
